song.title: WHO'S THAT ROBOT?
song.info:
(APRIL 2006)
This is *NOT* AY! This is a chiptune with sound-quality of ONE BIT (sound turn-on, sound turn-off, nothing more). Generated by Z80 chip with ULA chip as a transducer.
Author's note: "The song has been made using Timex 48Kb computer with its 1-bit sound system (which stands for BEEPER :) ). Software used: The Music Studio and Sintetizador De Voz. Two channels."
http://mister_beep.republika.pl/music.html
